name: Culticide
description:
Culticide is a puzzle platformer where you play as cult members who have to be strategically sacrificed to progress through the game.

Story:

It has been 300 years since our cult Lura Shin began…

Our goal is simple: take the Golden Gibbon from the Lubreth ruins before the day of reckoning and ascend to plains never ever experienced.

Under any means necessary: we must succeed.

The day has come to make our ultimate sacrifice.

As Death is not the end... Death is progress.
